report.title: HANDLER_MESSAGES
report.sql:
SELECT
sum(COALESCE(handlercount, 0)) as handlercount, sum(COALESCE(usercount, 0)) as usercount, sum(COALESCE(totalcount, 0)) as totalcount, {dategroup_disp} as display, date
FROM #__fss_date_day as baseday
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) as handlercount, DATE(posted) as posted FROM #__fss_ticket_messages as m WHERE posted BETWEEN '{opened_from} 00:00:00' AND '{opened_to} 23:59:59' AND m.admin IN (1, 2) {if,handler,'all',not} AND m.user_id = '{handler}' {endif}
AND m.ticket_ticket_id IN (SELECT id FROM #__fss_ticket_ticket WHERE source != 'email' AND source != 'email_declined')
GROUP BY DATE(posted) ) AS handlermc ON baseday.date = handlermc.posted
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) as usercount, DATE(posted) as posted FROM #__fss_ticket_messages as m WHERE posted BETWEEN '{opened_from} 00:00:00' AND '{opened_to} 23:59:59' AND m.admin = 0 {if,user,'all',not} {if,user} AND m.user_id = '{user}' {endif} {endif}
AND m.ticket_ticket_id IN (SELECT id FROM #__fss_ticket_ticket WHERE source != 'email' AND source != 'email_declined')
GROUP BY DATE(posted) ) AS usermc ON baseday.date = usermc.posted
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) as totalcount, DATE(posted) as posted FROM #__fss_ticket_messages as m WHERE posted BETWEEN '{opened_from} 00:00:00' AND '{opened_to} 23:59:59' AND m.admin IN (0, 1, 2)
AND m.ticket_ticket_id IN (SELECT id FROM #__fss_ticket_ticket WHERE source != 'email' AND source != 'email_declined')
GROUP BY DATE(posted) ) AS totalmc ON baseday.date = totalmc.posted
WHERE
baseday.date BETWEEN '{opened_from} 00:00:00' AND '{opened_to} 23:59:59'
AND
baseday.date >= (SELECT MIN(opened) as mindate FROM #__fss_ticket_ticket)
GROUP BY {dategroup}
ORDER BY date DESC

filter.name: handler
filter.sql: SELECT f.user_id as id, CONCAT(u.name, ' (', u.username, ')') as title FROM #__fss_users as f LEFT JOIN #__users as u ON f.user_id = u.id ORDER BY u.name
filter.title: HANDLER

filter.name: user
filter.sql: SELECT u.id, IF(u.id, CONCAT(u.name, ' (', u.username, ')'), 'Unknown') as title FROM #__fss_ticket_ticket as t LEFT JOIN #__users as u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.user_id > 0 AND u.id > 0 GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY u.name
